long_title: Computer-aided Gastric Lesion Localization and Miss Rate of Gastric Neoplasms: a Tandem, Randomized Controlled Study
prior_treatment_requirements: Exclude - * Inability to provide written informed consent
Exclude - * Patients deemed unsuitable or high-risk for endoscopy with severe comorbid illnesses
short_title: Miss Rate of Gastric Neoplasms Under Computer-aided Endoscopy
summary: This prospective randomized trial compares AI-assisted upper gastrointestinal endoscopy with high definition upper gastrointestinal endoscopy in term of missed rate of gastric neoplasm. The investigators hypothesize the miss rate of high definition upper gastrointestinal endoscopy is higher than AI-assisted upper gastrointestinal endoscopy.

arm.arm_description: AI-assisted upper gastrointestinal endoscopy follow immediately by high definition (HD) upper gastrointestinal endoscopy
HD upper gastrointestinal endoscopy follow immediately by AI-assisted upper gastrointestinal endoscopy
